Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this case we report the unexpected diagnosis of amyloidosis in a renal - transplant patient with pre - transplant monoclonal gammapathy of undetermined significance who developed proteinuria after conversion from tacrolimus to everolimus .

Let's think step by step.

| --- |
| Amyloidosis |
| Monoclonal gammapathy of undetermined significance |
| Proteinuria |

Note that "monoclonal gammapathy of undetermined significance" is a single disease entity, although it contains several words.
